1SK.MU.summary: Sektkellerei J.Oppmann AG produces and sells wines. It offers sparkling wines. The company was founded in 1865 and is headquartered in Wurzburg, Germany.

BEZ.DE.summary: Berentzen-Gruppe Aktiengesellschaft produces and sells spirits and non-alcoholic beverages for the food retail and hospitality sectors in Germany, rest of Europe, and internationally. It operates through Spirits, Non-alcoholic Beverages, and Fresh Juice Systems segments. The company provides non-alcoholic beverages, including mineral water, soft drinks, energy drinks, wellness drinks, iced tea, lemonades, and sports drinks; spirits; and fruit presses and juicers, and bottling systems, as well as untreated after-harvest oranges. It markets, distributes, and sells its products under the Berentzen, Pushkin, Tres PaÃ­ses, Strothmann, Hansen Rum, KrÃ¤uterbraut, Vivaris, Bommerlunder, Doornkaat, frutas naturales, Strothmann, Emsland Quelle, MÃ¤rkisch Kristall, Mio Mio, Sinalco, Citrocasa, and other brand names. The company also provides branded dealer and private-label spirits. The company was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in HaselÃ¼nne, Germany.

HAW.DE.summary: Hawesko Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the trading and sale of wines, champagnes, and other alcoholic drinks in Germany and rest of Europe. The company operates through three segments: Retail, B2B, and E-commerce. It operates a network of retail outlets under the Jacques' Wein-Depot and Wein & Co. brands. The company sells its products to end customers, various sales channels, catering trade, and retailers through specialty retail stores and wholesale operations/distribution, as well as through distance selling primarily under the Hawesko and Vinos names. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 327 Jacques' Wein-Depot outlets, as well as 21 branches of Wein & Co. in Austria. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Hamburg, Germany. Hawesko Holding AG is a subsidiary of Tocos Beteiligung GmbH.

SOP.MU.summary: Oppmann Immobilien AG operates and manages real estate properties. The company is headquartered in WÃ¼rzburg, Germany.

SWA.DE.summary: Schloss Wachenheim AG produces and sells sparkling and semi-sparkling wine products in Europe and internationally. The company also provides dealcoholized wines, vermouth products, ciders, spirits, and other wine-based drinks, as well as alcohol-free children's drinks. It markets its products under the Faber, Feist, Light Live, Schloss Wachenheim, Nymphenburg Sekt, and Schweriner Burggarten brands in Germany; Charles Volner, Muscador, and OpÃ©ra brands in France; and Cin&Cin and Dorato brands in Central and Eastern Europe. The company was formerly known as Sektkellerei Schloss Wachenheim AG and changed its name to Schloss Wachenheim AG in December 2014. Schloss Wachenheim AG was founded in 1888 and is based in Trier, Germany.
